attributes.action: Stop the high street banks from making after banking hours transactions from customers accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many high Street banks are allowing tranactions to be made from customers accounts, after normal banking hours!
They only allow transactions that allow money to be taken from your account, not deposited.
The transactions taking place this late may send people overdrawn, thus, incurring a very hefty bank charge.
After hours banking will not let you put money in your account, unless you have internet banking, and more than one account.
You cannot knock on the banks doors and deposit money to cover these transactions after normal banking hours!
All transactions after normal banking hours, should show on the following days date.
